languages.text: С годами Зауэрбэк-старший и Вольный Торговец даже сблизились — в той мере, в какой это было возможно для столь сухого и недружелюбного человека, как Махарий. Проявив себя как исполнительный и беспощадный воин, он стал комендантом Даргонуса и бдительно охранял жизнь и покой Лорд-капитана.

Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.
languages.original_text: С годами Зауэрбэк-старший и Вольный Торговец даже сблизились — в той мере, в какой это было возможно для столь сухого и недружелюбного человека, как Махарий. Проявив себя как исполнительный и беспощадный воин, он стал комендантом Даргонуса и бдительно охранял жизнь и покой Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: With passing years the elder Sauerback even grew close with the Rogue Trader — for as much as it was even possible for such a cold and ill-disposed person like Macharius. After he showed himself as a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became a warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded Lord Captain's life and peace.

With passing years the elder Sauerback even grew close with the Rogue Trader — for as much as it was even possible for such a cold and ill-disposed person like Macharius. After he showed himself as a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became a warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded Lord Captain's life and peace.

Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close with the Rogue Trader — at least, as much as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself as a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became a warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close with the Rogue Trader — at least, as much as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself as a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became a warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

languages.text: 多年以来，老苏尔贝克甚至和行商浪人走得越来越近，至少对这个冷酷无情的人而言，他们的关系已经算是相当亲密了。他证明了自己是无情而忠诚的战士，随后被任命为达戈努斯的守护者，警惕地保护着领主舰长的生命与安宁。
languages.original_text: Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

traits.locale_text: 多年以来，老苏尔贝克甚至和行商浪人走得越来越近，至少对这个冷酷无情的人而言，他们的关系已经算是相当亲密了。他证明了自己是无情而忠诚的战士，随后被任命为达戈努斯的守护者，警惕地保护着领主舰长的生命与安宁。

languages.text: Im Lauf der Jahre kam der ältere Sauerback {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} sogar recht nahe — zumindest so nahe, wie das ein kalter und übellauniger Mann eben tun kann. Nachdem er sich als pflichtbewusster und gnadenloser Krieger erwiesen hatte, wurde er zum Hüter von Dargonus und bewachte mit Argusaugen das Leben und den Frieden des Lord Captains.
languages.original_text: Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

traits.locale_text: Im Lauf der Jahre kam der ältere Sauerback {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} sogar recht nahe — zumindest so nahe, wie das ein kalter und übellauniger Mann eben tun kann. Nachdem er sich als pflichtbewusster und gnadenloser Krieger erwiesen hatte, wurde er zum Hüter von Dargonus und bewachte mit Argusaugen das Leben und den Frieden des Lord Captains.

languages.text: Au fil des ans, l'aîné des Sauerback se rapprocha même {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ; du moins, autant qu'une personne aussi froide et mal disposée pouvait le faire. Après avoir prouvé sa valeur guerrière, il devint un gardien de Dargonus et veilla avec zèle sur la vie et la tranquillité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

traits.locale_text: Au fil des ans, l'aîné des Sauerback se rapprocha même {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ; du moins, autant qu'une personne aussi froide et mal disposée pouvait le faire. Après avoir prouvé sa valeur guerrière, il devint un gardien de Dargonus et veilla avec zèle sur la vie et la tranquillité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: Con los años, el anciano Sauerback se acercó aún más a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, tanto como era posible para una persona tan fría y hosca. Tras demostrar su valía como guerrero diligente y despiadado, se convirtió en guardián de Dargonus y protegió con firmeza la vida y la tranquilidad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

traits.locale_text: Con los años, el anciano Sauerback se acercó aún más a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, tanto como era posible para una persona tan fría y hosca. Tras demostrar su valía como guerrero diligente y despiadado, se convirtió en guardián de Dargonus y protegió con firmeza la vida y la tranquilidad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: 何年ものかけて、長老のザウアーバックは自由開拓者と親しくなっていった。とはいえ、このような冷淡かつ不愉快な人物のできる範囲でではあるが。自分が忠実かつ無慈悲な戦士であることを証明した後、彼はダルゴナスのワーデンとなり、ロード・キャプテンの生命と平和を慎重に守った。
languages.original_text: Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

traits.locale_text: 何年ものかけて、長老のザウアーバックは自由開拓者と親しくなっていった。とはいえ、このような冷淡かつ不愉快な人物のできる範囲でではあるが。自分が忠実かつ無慈悲な戦士であることを証明した後、彼はダルゴナスのワーデンとなり、ロード・キャプテンの生命と平和を慎重に守った。

languages.text: Yıllar içinde ihtiyar Sauerback, onun gibi soğuk ve kötü hulu birinin yaklaşabileceği kadar Hür Tacir'e yaklaştı. Görev bilincine sahip, merhametsiz bir savaşçı olduğunu kanıtladıktan sonra Dargonus dizdarlarından oldu, Lord Kaptan'ın yaşamını ve huzurunu elinden geldiğince korudu.
languages.original_text: Over the years, the elder Sauerback even grew close to the Rogue Trader — at least, as far as such a cold and ill-disposed person could. After he proved himself a dutiful and merciless warrior, he became the warden of Dargonus and vigilantly guarded the Lord Captain's life and peace.

traits.locale_text: Yıllar geçtikçe Sauerback, Hür Tacir'e yaklaştı bile denilebilir. En azından onun gibi soğuk ve kötü hulu birinin yaklaşabileceği kadar. Görev bilincine sahip, merhametsiz bir savaşı olduğunu kanıtladıktan sonra Dargonus muhafızlarından biri oldu ve Lord Kaptan'ın yaşamını ve huzurunu elinden geldiğince korudu.
